resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107253</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107253</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202628</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sentence Combining and Decombining</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Programmsatz Kombinieren und Decombining</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Combinaison et Decombining de phrase</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Combinar e Decombining da sentença</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Combinazione e Decombining di frase</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συνδυασμός και Decombining πρότασης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El combinar y Decombining de la sentencia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will focus on stylistic choices and sentence fluency by combining, decombining, and recombining sentences in professional writing, peer writing, and their own writing.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer konzentrieren auf stilistische 
Wahlen und Programmsatzflußigkeit, indem sie kombinieren, 
decombining, und wiederverbinden Programmsätze im professionellen 
Schreiben, im Gleichschreiben und in ihrem eigenen Schreiben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants se concentreront sur des choix et 
la maîtrise stylistiques de phrase en combinant, decombining, et 
recombiner des phrases dans l'écriture professionnelle, l'écriture 
de pair, et leur propre écriture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes focalizarão em escolhas e no 
fluency stylistic da sentença combinando, decombining, e recombining 
sentenças na escrita profissional, na escrita do par, e na sua 
própria escrita.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi metteranno a fuoco sulle scelte e sul 
fluency stilistici di frase unendo, decombining e ricombinando le 
frasi nella scrittura professionale, nella scrittura del pari e nella 
loro propria scrittura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα εστιάσουν στις υφολογικές επιλογές 
και την άνεση πρότασης με το συνδυασμό, και τον επανασυνδιασμό των
προτάσεων στο επαγγελματικό γράψιμο, το γράψιμο συνομήληκων, και 
το γράψιμό τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes se centrarán en opciones y 
fluidez estilísticas de la sentencia combinando, decombining, y 
recombinando sentencias en la escritura profesional, la escritura del 
par, y su propia escritura.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:PETER BOBBE
FN:PETER BOBBE
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202628</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107253</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/sentence-combining-and-decombining</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
